title: [PATCHED] Final Fantasy X - International - JapaneseVoice Englis
description:
[EA89_REPACK] Final Fantasy X International +JapaneseVoice (JPN Audio, ENG Captions) PS2DVD - MOD BY GEESES
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


This rls is brought to you by
___________   _____     ______  ________ 
\_   _____/  /  _  \   /  __  \/   __   \
 |    __)_  /  /_\  \  >      <\____    /
 |        \/    |    \/   --   \  /    / 
/_______  /\____|__  /\______  / /____/  
        \/         \/        \/          
                BY FF FANS FOR FF FANS


Original release name: FF10IJV or Final Fantasy X International JapaneseVoice patch by geeses


This is basically an "UnDub" Version of Final Fantasy X International.

It replaces all voice and audio with the original JPN version of the game,
so it can be played with JPN audio and ENG text/captions.

Released only in Chinese communities, this release was pretty rare to spot.

Somebody on Blackcats-Games spotted it, renamed it and re-released it under their private tracker.
But searches couldn&#039;t help me get the torrent..

((Released under the name FFX International Undub (JPN Voice) PS2DVD - Blackcats))


Well.. after long searching, I managed to track the sites that had info about the project..
Originally it was released in Patcher form, where one had to possess the FFX International ISO
and the regular FFX JPN ISO to apply the patch..

*************************************************************************************************************************
                                              I M P O R T A N T   N O T E

There are three untranslated messages right when you start a New Game..

-The first one asks you to select either ORIGINAL sphere grid (Choice 1) or INTERNATIONAL sphere grid (Choice 2).

-The second one asks you to confirm your choice.

-The third one asks you to select caption (text/menu etc.) language. 
!!!CAUTION: First option is Japanese, second option is English. So choose the SECOND option.!!!
*************************************************************************************************************************

All Credits & Thanx fly out to:
geeses (and everybody who helped him out) - the goddamn GENIUS who made this modification! WORSHIP HIM!!!
xoa - the incredibly nice guy who helped me obtain this. Thanx a bunch, buddy! ;)

                         a n d   o f   c o u r s e

The Google(tm) Foundation - for creating the one search engine to rule them all!! xD




^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^

NOTICE: This is a patched version of torrent found in http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3880605 and should work for everyone (depending on PS2 or modchip version, some users might have experienced a crash near the end-game). That is fixed now and everything is fine. So those who want to get a perfect version of the game and don&#039;t want to start pathing themselves.

This file has a different releaser, as I got permission from the original releaser to put this patched up after I&#039;ve downloaded it. Took a while because this was in MegaUpload and I don&#039;t have a premium-access there (anyone wanting to buy me a lifetime Premium? :D)

Also one thing. I un-rarred the file. so its only one .ISO file and not 39 .rar files with 95 MB filesize. Those of you who have their HDD&#039;s full of porn already and can&#039;t extract this without deleting some... fear not as its not needed anymore :)

Truly yours,
Arinohyoshi
